attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to request that the football league remove the 15-point deduction from Leeds United AFC and change it to 20
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to request that the football league remove the 15-point deduction from Leeds United AFC and make it 20 points

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
